products.title: Ferrero Rocher
products.description: Our take on that family favourite. We've mixed hazelnut praline through the brownie, along with chopped, caramelised hazelnuts and finished top on with a super crackly and crunchy topping.

products.title: Biscoff
products.description: Our signature dark chocolate brownie packed full of white and milk chocolate chips and then coated with all three types of chocolate on top. Our decadent take on a classic.

products.title: Malteser
products.description: Our signature dark chocolate brownie packed full of white and milk chocolate chips and then coated with all three types of chocolate on top. Our decadent take on a classic.
